content:
Help us to develop our podcast audience

THE ECONOMIST  was founded as a print newspaper in 1843, but today our analysis reaches over 40m people through digital media. Our podcast audience alone is 8m monthly downloads. More people than ever discover us for the first time on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, or through a video or podcast.

Economist Radio’s eight producers make around 10 podcasts per week, drawing on the reporting and knowledge of our global network of correspondents. We launched our new flagship current-affairs show, The Intelligence, in January 2019. We are revamping our successful features shows as well as producing big occasional series in partnerships.

The team now needs someone to focus on sharing our podcasts in the right places online and to think strategically about how to grow their audiences. The role requires someone with experience in podcasting, as a producer or on social media. Experience in audience development for a podcast is an advantage.

The work ranges from creating content about our podcasts for Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn, to more active audience engagement and development. This might include working with our podcast partners and building online communities of listeners.

Are you eager to shape The Economist ’s presence in podcasts?

If you answer yes, we’d like to hear from you. Send the following items to radiojobs@economist.com :

This is a one-year contract. The salary depends on your experience. Applicants must be eligible to work in the UK. The deadline for applications is midnight GMT Tuesday, March 26th 2019 .

Requirements

The Economist Group values diversity. We are committed to equal opportunities and creating an inclusive environment for all our employees. We welcome applicants regardless of ethnic origin, national origin, gender, race, colour, religious beliefs, disability, sexual orientation or age.

ex: n. 申请人，申请者；请求者

wp.Applicant Information: 申请人资料;申请人信息;申请者信息;申请者资料

eg2: This Applicant is by far the better than that one.
这个申请者远比那一个好。
But the college has seen more than one male  “sit back on the couch, sometimes with their eyes closed, while their mom tells them where to go and what to do.
但是，在大学里不止会看到一两个男性申请人“靠在椅子上，有时候还闭着眼，悠闲自得。 有时候还要他妈妈告诉他该去哪，该做什么。
One such questionnaire shall be presented to each .
每位申请人均将得到这样一份问卷。

wp.Applicant Information: 申请人资料;申请人信息;申请者信息;申请者资料

ex: n. 申请人，申请者；请求者
eg2: This applicant is by far the better than that one.
这个申请者远比那一个好。
But the college has seen more than one male  “sit back on the couch, sometimes with their eyes closed, while their mom tells them where to go and what to do.
但是，在大学里不止会看到一两个男性申请人“靠在椅子上，有时候还闭着眼，悠闲自得。 有时候还要他妈妈告诉他该去哪，该做什么。
One such questionnaire shall be presented to each .
每位申请人均将得到这样一份问卷。

ex: v. 收缩；订约；感染
n. 【法】合同；〈非正式〉买凶杀人
网络 契约；合约；婚约
eg2: a contract of employment
雇用合同
a research contract
从事研究的合同
to enter into/make/sign a contract with the supplier
与供应商签订合同
These clauses form part of the contract between buyer and seller.
这些条款构成买卖双方所签合同的一部分。
a contract for the supply of vehicles
提供车辆的合约
to win/be awarded a contract to build a new school
获得承建一所新学校的合同
a contract worker(= one employed on a contract for a fixed period of time)
合同工
I was on a three-year contract that expired last week.
我签订的三年期合同已于上周期满。
Under the terms of the contract the job should have been finished yesterday.
根据合同的条款，这项工作本应于昨天完成。
She is under contract to(= has a contract to work for) a major American computer firm.
她已签约为一家大型美国计算机公司工作。
The offer has been accepted, subject to contract(= the agreement is not official until the contract is signed) .
此报价已获接受，尚须以签约为准。
They were sued for breach of contract(= not keeping to a contract) .
他们被指控违约。
to take out a contract on sb
雇凶手杀害某人
Glass contracts as it cools.
玻璃遇冷收缩。
a contracting market
萎缩的市场
The heart muscles contract to expel the blood.
心脏肌肉收缩以挤压出血液。
The exercise consists of stretching and contracting the leg muscles.
此项训练包括伸展和收缩腿部肌肉。
‘I will’ and ‘I shall’ are usually contracted to ‘I'll’(= made shorter) .
I will 和 I shall 通常缩约为 I'll。
to contract AIDS/a virus/a disease
感染艾滋病╱病毒╱疾病
The player is contracted to play until August.
这位选手签约参加比赛到八月份。
Several computer engineers have been contracted to the finance department.
有几位计算机工程师与财务部门签订了合同。
She has contracted to work 20 hours a week.
她已签订每周工作 20 小时的合同。

ex: n. 记者；通讯员；通信者
网络 通讯记者；驻外记者；常驻外埠记者
eg2: the BBC's political correspondent
英国广播公司的政治新闻记者
a foreign/war/sports, etc. correspondent
驻外、战地、体育等记者
our Delhi correspondent
我们驻德里的通讯员
She's a poor correspondent(= she does not write regularly) .
她是个懒于写信的人。

ex: n. 障碍；（指状态、身心、学习等方面的）缺陷
网络 残疾；无能；失能
eg2: a physical/mental disability
生理缺陷；心理障碍
people with severe learning disabilities
具有严重学习障碍的人
He qualifies for help on the grounds of disability.
他因身有残疾有资格得到帮助。

wp.Polarization diversity: 极化分集;偏振分集;极化多样化
wp.Angle diversity: 角度分集;		射角分集
wp.ecosystem diversity: 生态多样性;生态系统多样性;多样性;生态系多样性
wp.FUNGAL DIVERSITY: 真菌多样性;真菌多样性·英文版
wp.space diversity: 空间分集;空间多样化;空间分径
wp.individual diversity: 个体差;生长发育的个体差异

ex: n. 多样性；差异
eg2: Thus, they have few clues as to why this diversity exists.
这样，他们对于这多样性存在的线索知道很少。
A world of peace and solidarity can only be accomplished by acknowledging and celebrating our .
只有承认和颂扬我们的多样性，才能实现一个和平与团结的世界。
They help us grasp the diversity of life on the planet.
这些标本有助于我们把握地球生命的多样性。

wp.Eager for: 不甘寂寞;渴望;迫切要;渴求
wp.eager a: 热切的;渴望的;热切渴望的
wp.eager evaluation: 及早求值;热情计算;急切评估
wp.Eager Loading: 预先加载;贪婪加载;积极式载入

ex: adj. 渴望的；热切的；热心的
n. (Eager)人名；(英)伊格
eg2: The girl in the shop is always eager to please every customer.
这位女店员总是很热心地对待每一位顾客。
They are mirrors, reflecting how eager the youth are to succeed like their icons.
这些照片是镜子，反映了年轻人渴望成功，犹如他们的偶像。
Usually I turn down anyone who seems too , but his place was right there and I was in no mood to start cycling round looking for anywhere else.
通常我会拒绝看上去太过热心的人，但是他的旅馆就在旁边，我也没有心情再骑车去找别的地方，于是就住进了他的旅馆。

ex: adj. 合格的，合适的；符合条件的；有资格当选的
n. 合格者；适任者；有资格者

wp.eligible voter: 合格选民;符合资格的选民
wp.eligible securities: 合资格证券;合格证券;证券资格
wp.eligible bill: 合法票据;		合格票据
wp.eligible countries: 有资格的国家;符合资格的国家;符合条件的国家

eg2: Any number of eligible products can be installed to a package group.
可以在一个包组中安装任意数量的符合条件的产品。
Officials in Shanghai are urging eligible couples to have two children amid concerns over an ageing population, the first time in decades that Chinese authorities are encouraging couples to conceive.
由于担心人口老龄化，中国当局几十年来首次鼓励夫妇怀孕，在上海，有关机构的官员们鼓励符合条件的夫妇生育两个孩子。
This set is input to the cost-based optimizer that decides whether to use any of the eligible indexes or not.
将该组索引输入到基于成本的优化器，这个优化器决定是否使用任何合适的索引。

ex: adj. 种族的；人种的
n. 旗舰；王牌
网络 旗舰店；旗舰系列；佼佼者
eg2: The company is opening a new flagship store in London.
这家公司将在伦敦新开一家旗舰店。

wp.inclusive language: 中立语言;具包容性的语言;使用中性语言;广容性语言
wp.inclusive disjunction: 可兼析取;包含性析取;又称可兼析取;选言连接词
wp.inclusive finance: 普惠金融;包容性金融;普惠制金融
wp.inclusive OR: 可兼的逻辑或;或;可兼或
wp.inclusive a: 包括一应费用在内的;首末日包括在内的;包括的

ex: adj. 包括的，包含的
eg2: This process should be  of all departments and all situations.
此过程应该包括所有部门和所有的情况。
As a convenience, I use the term "mechanism," as in the phrase "governance mechanism" to be all- of the components identified above.
为了方便起见，如在短语“治理机制”中一样，我使用术语“机制”来包括上面所识别的所有组成部分。
Obviously, if "ashtray" or "painting" belongs in home furnishings, then it certainly belongs in the bigger, more  combined category too.
显然，如果“烟灰缸”或“油画”属于家居用品，那么它们当然属于一个大的包含更多的分类中。

ex: adj. 偶然的；临时的；特殊场合的

wp.occasional income: 偶然收入;临时收入;偶然所得;非经常收入
wp.occasional error: 随机误差;偶然误差;发生的事
wp.occasional call: 偶然通话;呼叫转移;临时呼叫;临时靠港

eg2: For those of you who like to print an  chat, the chat window now includes an option to print the conversation.
如果您想要打印特殊场合的聊天记录，聊天窗口现在包含了打印会话的选项。
The program also introduced occasional mutationsand randomness, on the off chance that one of them might produce an accidentalgenius.
程序也会引入一些偶然的变化和随机性，因为这样可能带来一两个意想不到的惊喜。
You should be cautious of these distractions, but allow yourself the  distraction to break up your day.
对于这些让人分心的事物你应该谨慎，但是你也要允许自己偶尔的分心去分解你的一天。

wp.Orientation Week: 迎新周;新生训练周;适应周;新生周
wp.biaxial orientation: 双轴取向;双轴顺向;单轴与背
wp.preferential orientation: 择优定向;优先定位;最佳取向;择优取向
wp.interior orientation: 内部定向;内部取向;内定向;内方位
wp.orientation meeting: 指学校综合情况;新生报到会;情况说明会;学期前会议

ex: n. 方向；定向；适应；情况介绍
eg2: How should I choose the  of my curves?
我应该怎样选择曲线的方向呢？
The winding trail caused us to lose our .
迂回曲折的小道使我们迷失了方向。
We need to avoid these spurious 0,0 readings, as about one out of every 10 readings at any  of the sensor will be 0,0 -- invalid data, indeed.
需要避免这些虚假的 0,0 读数，来自传感器各个方向上的每 10 个读数中就会有一个读数是 0,0 —— 无效的数据，确实如此。

ex: vt. 修补；翻新；修改
n. 改进；换新鞋面
eg2: We must fight the urge to revamp our diplomatic relations.
我们必须极力修补我们的外交关系。
Boeing will decide in the next few months whether to embark on a  of its 737 single-aisle jetliner line.
波音公司将在近几个月决定是否对其737单通道喷气飞机生产线进行翻新。
I needed to revamp my lifestyle!
我需要改变我的生活方式！

ex: adv. 战略性地；战略上

Title: Podcast audience producer

paperStatistics.title: Podcast audience producer
paperStatistics.desc: Help us to develop our podcast audience
